TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripTextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost

summary.span: 表示 中的文本框，用户可以在此输入文本。

span.span: Represents a text box in a that allows the user to enter text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 针对在中承载的进行了优化 。 is the optimized for hosting in a . 托管控件的属性和事件的子集在 级别公开，但基础 控件可通过属性完全访问 。A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the level, but the underlying control is fully accessible through the property. 控件允许用户在应用程序中输入文本。The control allows the user to enter text in an application. 此控件具有在标准 Windows 文本框控件中找不到的其他功能，包括多行编辑。This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows text box control, including multiline editing. 通常， 控件用于显示单行文本或接受它作为输入。Typically, a control is used to display a single line of text or accept it as input. 您可以使用 来启用显示或输入多行文本。You can use the to enable multiple lines of text to be displayed or entered. 将 和 属性设置为以 `true` 允许在多行控件中进行更大的文本操作 。Set the and properties to `true` to allow greater text manipulation in a multiline control. 可以 通过将 属性设置为特定数量的字符来限制输入到控件中的文本量。You can limit the amount of text entered into a control by setting the property to a specific number of characters. 使用 属性可允许用户只键入大写、仅小写或将大写和小写字符组合到 控件中。Use the property to allow the user to type only uppercase, only lowercase, or a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters into the control. 若要限制在控件中输入文本 ，可以为事件创建事件处理程序，以便 验证在控件中输入的每个字符。To restrict text from being entered in a control, you can create an event handler for the event in order to validate each character entered in the control. 还可以 通过将属性设置为来限制控件中的所有数据输入 `true` 。You can also restrict all entry of data in a control by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 具有各种常见属性设置的，包括自动完成选项。The following code example demonstrates a with various common property settings, including automatic completion options. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在多行 控件中按 Enter 键时，是在控件中创建一行新文本还是激活窗体的默认按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing ENTER in a multiline control creates a new line of text in the control or activates the default button for the form.

value.span: 如果按 Enter 键时在多行版本的控件中创建一行新文本，则为 ；如果按 Enter 键时激活窗体的默认按钮，则为 。

span.span: if the ENTER key creates a new line of text in a multiline version of the control; if the ENTER key activates the default button for the form.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值为 `false` ，则用户必须按 CTRL + enter 在多行控件中创建新行 。If the value of this property is `false`, the user must press CTRL+ENTER to create a new line in a multiline control. 如果窗体没有默认按钮，则无论此属性的值如何，ENTER 键都将始终在控件中创建新的文本行。If there is no default button for the form, then the ENTER key will always create a new line of text in the control, no matter what the value of this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于设置各种 公共属性设置的语法，包括 属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various common property settings, including the property . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果参数中指定的位置在 `pt` 控件的工作区之外，则返回最接近中指定的点的字符串的第一个字符 `pt` 。If the location specified in the `pt` parameter is outside the client area of the control, the first character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned. 您可以使用此方法来确定哪些字符位于控件中的特定点附近。You can use this method to determine which characters are located near a specific point within the control. 然后，可以使用此值对该位置的文本执行操作。You can then use this value to perform operations on the text at that location. > [!NOTE] > 如果参数中的指定位置 `pt` 位于控件的工作区右侧，则返回最靠近中指定的点的字符串的最后一个字符 `pt` 。If the specified location in the `pt` parameter is located on the right side of the client area of the control, the last character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回与参数中指定的位置最接近的字符索引 `pt` 。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字符索引是控件中的文本的从零开始的索引，其中包括空格。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 您可以使用此方法，通过将鼠标坐标传递到此方法来确定用户在文本中的位置。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 如果要在鼠标指针悬停在控件文本中的单词时执行任务，这会很有用。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the mouse pointer hovers over a word in the text of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `lineNum` 参数为负，则 返回0。If the `lineNum` parameter is negative, returns 0. 如果 `lineNum` 参数超出控件中的行数，则 返回控件中最后一行的第一个字符索引。If the `lineNum` parameter exceeds the number of lines in the control, returns the first character index for the last line in the control. 返回物理行的第一个字符索引。 returns the first character index of a physical line. 物理行是显示的行，而不是所分配的行。The physical line is the displayed line, not the assigned line. 由于换行，显示的行数可以大于分配的行数。The number of displayed lines can be greater than the number of assigned lines due to word wrap. 例如，如果将两个长行分配给一个 控件并将 和设置 为 `true` ，则两个长时间分配的行将导致四个物理 (或) 显示的行。For example, if you assign two long lines to a control and set and to `true`, the two long assigned lines result in four physical (or displayed lines).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够根据在方法的参数中指定的字符索引来确定行号 `index` 。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控件中的第一行文本返回值零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法返回索引字符位于控件内的物理行号。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果控件中第一个逻辑文本行的一部分被换到下一行，则 当指定字符索引处的字符已包装到第二个物理行时，该方法返回1。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果 将设置为 `false` ，则行的任何部分都不会换到下一步，并且方法将为指定的字符索引返回0。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 您可以使用此方法来确定特定字符索引所在的行。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在调用 方法搜索文本后，您可以获取搜索结果所在位置的字符索引。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 您可以使用该方法返回的字符索引来调用此方法 ，以确定找到该单词的行。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. > [!NOTE] > 如果参数中指定的字符索引 `index` 超出了控件内包含的可用行数，则返回最后一个行号。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够确定特定字符索引所在的控件中的位置。This method enables you to determine where in the control a specific character index is located. 对于此类任务，您可以使用此方法来显示快捷菜单项或控件中某个词的帮助信息。You can use this method for such tasks as displaying shortcut menu items or help information for a word in the control. 例如，如果想要在用户右键单击控件中的某个单词时向用户显示选项菜单，则可以使用此方法来确定 word 正确显示控件的位置 。For example, if you wanted to display a menu of options to the user when the user right clicks on a word in the control, you can use this method to determine the position of the word to properly display a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ScrollToCaret() cil managed

summary.span: 将控件内容滚动到当前插入符号位置。

span.span: Scrolls the contents of the control to the current caret position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可让你滚动控件的内容，直到插入符号位于控件的可见区域内。This method enables you to scroll the contents of the control until the caret is within the visible region of the control. 如果插入符号位于控件的可见区域下方，则 方法将滚动控件的内容，直到在控件的底部显示插入符号。If the caret is positioned below the visible region of the control, the method will scroll the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the bottom of the control. 如果插入符号位于控件的可见区域之上，则此方法将滚动控件的内容，直到在控件顶部显示插入符号。If the caret is positioned above the visible region of the control, this method scrolls the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the top of the control. 您可以在多行文本框中使用此方法，以确保当前文本输入点位于控件的可见区域内。You can use this method in a multiline text box to ensure that the current text entry point is within the visible region of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果控件没有焦点，或插入符号已定位在控件的可视区域中，则此方法不起作用。This method has no effect if the control does not have focus or if the caret is already positioned in the visible region of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要将起始位置设置为控件文本中的第一个字符，请将 `start` 参数设置为0。If you want to set the start position to the first character in the control's text, set the `start` parameter to 0. 您可以使用此方法来选择文本的子字符串，例如搜索控件的文本和替换信息。You can use this method to select a substring of text, such as when searching through the text of the control and replacing information. > [!NOTE] > 您可以通过在文本框中将参数设置为要将插入符号移动到的位置来以编程方式移动插入符号 `start` ，并将参数的值设置 `length` 为零 (0) 。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the `start` parameter to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the `length` parameter to a value of zero (0). 文本框必须具有焦点，才能移动插入符号。The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对所选文本执行操作之前，可以使用此属性来确定当前在 "文本框" 控件中是否选择了任何字符。You can use this property to determine if any characters are currently selected in the text box control before performing operations on the selected text. 如果将属性的值 设置为大于控件文本内的字符数的值，则属性的值 将设置为控件中的文本的整个长度减去 (属性的值（ 如果为属性) 指定了任何值） 。When the value of the property is set to a value that is larger than the number of characters within the text of the control, the value of the property is set to the entire length of text within the control minus the value of the property (if any value is specified for the property). > [!NOTE] > 您可以通过在文本框中将插入符号的位置设置为要在 其中移动插入符号的位置，并将该 属性的值设置为零 (0) ，以编程方式在文本框中移动插入符号。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the property to a value of zero (0). 文本框必须具有焦点，才能移动插入符号。The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在控件中未选择任何文本，此属性将指示新文本的插入点。If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point for new text. 如果将此属性设置为超出控件中文本长度的位置，则所选内容的起始位置将被置于最后一个字符之后。If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position will be placed after the last character. 在文本框控件中选择文本时，更改此属性可能会降低属性的值 。When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property might decrease the value of the property. 如果控件中由属性指示的位置之后的剩余文本 小于属性的值 ，则 自动减小属性的值。If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the property is less than the value of the property, the value of the property is automatically decreased. 属性的值 从不导致 属性增加。The value of the property never causes an increase in the property. > [!NOTE] > 您可以通过在文本框中将插入符号的位置设置为要在 其中移动插入符号的位置，并将该 属性的值设置为零 (0) ，以编程方式在文本框中移动插入符号。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the property to a value of zero (0). 文本框必须具有焦点，才能移动插入符号。The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.
